home.whoAmI:
My name is **Boris Laporte**, I am a French full-stack developer based in Paris.
I'm a fourth year student at Hetic.
home.status:
I love traveling all around the world and I'm **looking for a 6 months internship** anywhere.
(july to december)

projects.name: Ronan Polin
projects.title: Ronan Polin's portfolio
projects.desc: This project was made for my friend Ronan, who were looking for a developer to build his portfolio. This project forced me to rethink my way to make my react apps. Why ? Because this portfolio doesn't really have any templates, a lot of details change depending on different variables. I learned a new way to build my components so I can easly handle all variations and now, Ronan and I are proud to show it.

projects.name: Lipsty
projects.title: Absolutely flirty
projects.desc: How to make an application about cocktails that won't be the same than the others ? Mix seduction and cocktail recipes and you get Lipsty ! Thanks to the Absolut ( Brand ) API this app will advises you the best cocktails to seduce the one you desire.

projects.name: Claude Shannon
projects.title: The world in binary
projects.desc: In the honor of Claude Shannon's 100th birthday. The CNRS asked us to make a website tracing the most important parts of his life. But who is Claude Shannon ? Father of the theory of information, he is the one who discovered that every problems could be resumed to a chain of conditions true or false, this discovery was the begining of the binary system and of the informatic. Without him, our world wouldn't be the same today.

projects.name: Timokids
projects.title: An educational app for children
projects.desc: When I was in Internship with Timokids, I had several missions to improve their website. After a little study of it, I advised them that it would be better to make a new one, more maintainable for future modification and while I was at it, make a new design while taking account for the SEO.

projects.name: TribuCancer
projects.title: Together we are stronger
projects.desc:
Made for the association of the same name.
Its goal, is to help the sick and their relatives to live better with the decease. Thanks to differents services to break the social isolation and activities to escape. These allow thousands of people to fight their decease and rediscover the joys of life.

projects.name: Geek-Art
projects.title: The alphabet of Geek-Art
projects.desc: This project is directly inspired by the book "L'alphabet du Geek-Art", which includes many artists and some of their works in alphabetical order. In account for the rather short time to realize it, only the artists from A to M are listed there. We did put the emphasis on navigation so that we could browse the site as if it were flipping through the pages of the same book.
